body:
anselmo@dream.unipa.it wrote:


> Ok, I'll wait until the next release.
> But let us know when!
> (Or did I miss the last announcement?)


Um, I don't think I ever sent one out. This is a pretty hush-hush sort 
of operation... :^)


> I hope to have more time to experiment with pmap.
> (I'm currently developing a Blender interface for Radiance,
> and I also want to inlcude a way to manage the pmap extension)


That'll come in handy 'cos I get lots of GUI requests for pmap and never 
know where to redirect them.


 > You seem to be rather sad about it.


More like disappointed, and I see no reason to work for free anymore.


> I found it to be a very useful piece of software,
> especially for lighting pipe and redirecting system design.
> Once again, thanks for your work!


Well, I'm glad somebody's been benefiting from this! Funny I only hear 
this sorta stuff *outside* the lab...




--Roland






END OF LINE. (MCP)
